title: St. Stephen Fish Fry
description: Fried fish and brass music -- what could be better?

title: Pensacola Civic Band Concert
description: Members of the Polyphonic Brass Quintet perform with the Pensacola Civic Band for conductor Don Snowden's farewell concert.

title: PSC Music Appreciation Concert
description: A special concert for Pensacola State College Music Appreciation students. Join the Polyphonic Brass for a journey through the entire history of western music.

description: A special concert for Pensacola State College Music Appreciation students. Join the Polyphonic Brass for a journey through the entire history of western music.

title: PBQ Does PDQ
description: The eclectic works of J.S. Bach's long-lost son come to life!

title: Polyphonic Brass Ensemble: Amalgamation
description: The extended Polyphonic Brass family comes together for a night of brass music you won't forget!
